content: Hello, @Paul Knapp is there any discussion around how to specify claim/EOB type as fee-for-service claim or capitated encounter (value-based healthcare concept) in FHIR resources? May we extend .use for that (adding use = encounter)?

Why would that be a different use, wouldn't you simply be supplying a Capitation billing code (e.g. 1 month of care) rather than a fee for service billing code (code for specific service performed or product provided)?

@Paul Knapp I didn't know there are special billing codes for capitated services. as far as I see from adjudicated claims data, payers send usual billing codes with two kinds of indicators: capitated facility claim indicator and capitated service indicator.
